summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the acquisition by purchase and/or condemnation of a pipeline right of way for the water supply system of the City of Seattle over and across certain lands in the northeast one-quarter of Section 30, Township 26 North, Range 4 East, W. M., providing for the acquisition in fee simple by purchase and/or condemnation of land and other property in Block 4, H. E. Orr Park for a pumping plant site for said water supply system; and providing for payment therefor from the Water Fund.
